Migrated(address,bytes32,address,uint256.details: emitted when user stakes an asset

params.migratedAmount: how much of receipt token was migrated

Staked(address,bytes32,address,uint256,u.details: emitted when user stakes an asset

params.depositTokenAmount: how much of deposit token was staked
params.receiptTokenAmount: how much of receipt token was received

Unstaked(address,bytes32,address,uint256.details: emitted when user unstakes an asset

params.depositTokenAmount: how much deposit token was received
params.receiptTokenAmount: how much receipt token was unstaked
